name: Environaut\Runner\Runner
short_desc: Reads checks from the config, executes them in that order and compiles the results into a report.

run.name: run
run.short_desc: Execute the checks that are defined in the config and generate a report to consume by others.

getReport.name: getReport
getReport.short_desc: Returns the report that contains the results of the checks.

setParameters.name: setParameters
setParameters.short_desc: Sets the given runtime parameters on the runner.

parameters.name: parameters
parameters.short_desc: runtime parameters understood by the runner

setConfig.name: setConfig
setConfig.short_desc: Sets the given config on the runner.

setCache.name: setCache
setCache.short_desc: Sets the readonly cache used by checks to determine if they've been run before and if they can reuse prior settings to let users just confirm settings etc.

cache.name: cache
cache.short_desc: instance that contains all cached settings for checks

setCommand.name: setCommand
setCommand.short_desc: Sets the command on the runner to have access to the input and output.

DEFAULT_CHECK_IMPLEMENTOR.name: DEFAULT_CHECK_IMPLEMENTOR
DEFAULT_CHECK_IMPLEMENTOR.short_desc: Default namespaced class name to use for checks if none is specified in the check definition of the config.
